title: BRAM THE MUSTACHE MAN
body:
http://i.imgur.com/S3XKi3C.jpg

Can we take a moment to appreciate the man in muscle, the mustache harbinger of poros?

replies.body: I mustache you a question, but I'm shaving it for later

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Hjarta,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1uiokGW6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-17T23:12:19.773+0000)
>
> I mustache you a question, but I'm shaving it for later

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Let us have a moment of silence for all the Mustashio Muscle Men who have given their life for their ADC's, regardless of the ADC's K/D/A; Whether by Flash, by W, or by sheer body blocking, for they are the manliest of men.

I play that song way too much.

And by "way too much" I mean "not enough."
that stash is bigger than my future
i already do this every day praying for pool party braum to be released {{sticker:sg-lux}}
